pullRequest.title: [Observability] Add additional tags to telemetry data from HTTP client
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Add additional tags to telemetry data from HTTP client

Approach

Add status_code_group, URL and method tags to each trace and metric

commit.message: Add tags for http methods in client endpoint
Use status_code_group tag instead of status_code tag in http client
Use separate function to add additional telemetry tags to http client
